games.title: hello-world
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Example game for the hackerpet hub, hosted on the hackerpet-games repository.

games.title: EatingTheFood
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Help your player get comfortable with the Hub’s sounds and movements.

games.title: ExploringTheTouchpads
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: A foodtreat is offered, but the player will also earn a reward when they press a touchpad.

games.title: EngagingConsistently
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Now your player will need to press a touchpad to earn a reward.

games.title: AvoidingUnlitTouchpads
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Your player must learn that only pressing illuminated touchpads results in success.

games.title: LearningTheLights
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Only one touchpad is illuminated in this challenge.

games.title: MasteringTheLights
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Only one lit touchpad, and now your player will need to engage even more consistently.

games.title: RespondingQuickly
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Your player now has to press two touchpads in a row to solve one puzzle.

games.title: LearningBrightness
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: After the first press, your player will need to choose the brightest touchpad.

games.title: LearningDoubleSequences
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Your player must press the brightest touchpad accurately twice in a row.

games.title: LearningLongerSequences
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Your player is challenged to complete patterns of up to nine moves in a row.

games.title: MatchingTwoColors
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: The Hub introduces colors, your player’s job is to make all the touchpads match.

games.title: MatchingMoreColors
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: This challenge adds white to the mix, the number of solutions grows exponentially!

games.title: hello-animal
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: An introduction to the basics of building hackerpet interactions. It will wait until the Hub's Device Layer is in a good state, then turn on the main lights, and then wait for one of the Hub's touchpads to be touched.

games.title: OneTwoThreeButtonGame
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: This game can be useful during initial training of a player to use the Hub.

games.title: ColorMatchGame
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: This challenge adds white to the mix, the number of solutions grows exponentially!

games.title: WhackAMole
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description_sentence: Once your dog or cat can see the lights easily, this is a more "active" game for the Hub that challenges your dog or cat's "paw-eye" coordination

games.title: ControlPet
games.author: Michael Gschwandtner <mgschwan@gmail.com>
games.description_sentence: Remote control app for the hub. Control the hub either via a webinterface or from a python program. Enables rapid prototyping of new ideas and guided learning of the hub

games.title: Symon
games.author: Jelmer Tiete <jelmer@tiete.be>
games.description_sentence: CleverPet's take on the classic Simon game!
